The new update is here!
We try to make Dominoes better for you with every update and improve your game experience.
Thanks to your feedback, we’ve fixed dozens of small bugs and improved the overall app stability.
Thank you for playing Dominoes!

Hey, how is it going? We just wanna know 2 things:
1) Your are safe 2) You are enjoying YOUR Game at this very moment!

In the meantime, we have been squashing bugs and making the game even better!

Sincerely yours,
ZiMAD

Creeping bugs here and there... always trying to ruin your wonderful game experience! So, we've found and squashed another pack! Thanks for your feedback and support. Enjoy!

Have you been waiting for a new version of Domino? We hope we won't disappoint you. In this version, we have fixed a large number of minor bugs and generally improved the performance. Play Domino and tell us your impressions. We will definitely take all your comments into account in future updates.

Dear Players, holidays are coming! We wish you a Bright and Joyful Christmas and may this festival bring abundant joy and happiness in your life!  We hope you will enjoy the game, and have a good time. Leave your reviews, because all your feedback is important to us. We will continue to improve our Domino!

The new version of our Domino is here! Your feedback and comments help us to improve the game, and to delight you with new features. In this update, we have fixed all the annoying bugs, and we have increased the app's stability in general, to make the game more enjoyable for you. New Domino features will be waiting for you in the next updates! :)
